author: All About Jazz
title: Free MP3: Along the Way by Satoko Fujii
text: [Home](//www.allaboutjazz.com) » [Music](/media) » Song of the Day Along the Way by Satoko Fujii From the album Album Title: [Jet Black](//www.allaboutjazz.com/album/jet-black-satoko-fujii) Label: [Libra Records](https://boston.jazznearyou.com/recordlabel/libra-records) Released: 2024 Listen [Sign in](javascript:void(0);) to view listen count About the Album With Jet Black, pianist and composer Satoko Fujii’s Tokyo Trio catapults to the forefront of piano trios in contemporary improvisation. Propelled by Fujii’s unique compositions, the improvisational prowess of bassist Takashi Sugawa and drummer Ittetsu Takemura, and an ever-deepening group rapport, Tokyo Trio’s sophomore outing is among the most exciting small ensemble releases in Fujii’s long career. Song Listing Along The Way; Gentle Slope; Sky Reflection; From Sometime; Take A Step; Jet Black. Personnel Date featured January 6, 2024 This song appears by permission of the contributing artist and/or record company. It is for personal use only; no other rights are granted or implied.
